keras_model_type =  "fast1" ## always try "fast" first, then "fast2", "auto", etc.
### always set early_stopping to True first and then change it to False
#### You always need 15 max_trials to get something decent #####
#### always set tuner to "storm" and then "optuna". 

project_name = "Gender Recognition by Voice Identify a voice as male or female"
model_options = {'char_limit':50, 'cat_feat_cross_flag':False,
                 'max_trials': 10, "tuner": "storm"}
keras_options = {"patience":10, 'class_weight': True, 'early_stopping': True, 
                 'lr_scheduler': '', "optimizer": 'RMS'}

source.6fd99189:
Gender Recognition by Voice

#### Identify a voice as male or female #### The goal of the project is to perform Deep Learning in a single line of code ### #### Description Voice Gender Gender Recognition by Voice and Speech Analysis This database was created to identify a voice as male or female, based upon acoustic properties of the voice and speech. The dataset consists of 3,168 recorded voice samples, collected from male and female speakers. ##### Link Dataset ###### [Here](https://www.kaggle.com/primaryobjects/voicegender) Special thanks to Mr.RSESHA for the tool deep_autoviml This is his project ###### [Here](https://www.kaggle.com/rsesha/water-quality-classification-deep-autoviml/comments)
